## Installation

```bash
# Update in your Cargo.toml
[dependencies]
elo-rust = "0.x.x"

# Or install the CLI tool
cargo install elo-rust
```

## Upgrade Guide

### From v0.1.0 to v0.2.0

No breaking changes. Simply update your dependency:

```toml
elo-rust = "0.2"  # or "0.2.0" for exact version
```
